sentences.en: She heard a floorboard creak upstairs.
sentences.cn: 她听见楼上的地板发出嘎吱嘎吱的响声。

sentences.en: A shadow moves across the wall. A floorboard creaks.
sentences.cn: 一道影子从墙上飘闪而过，地板发出吱吱的响声。

sentences.en: This platform is urban heat the floorboard of wireless product.
sentences.cn: 该平台是城市热点无线产品的总称。
